list.abs: 2、蓝鳍金枪鱼（bluefin tuna）（Bluefin Tuna）是金枪鱼类中最大型的鱼种。身体短而结实、锥状细长的身躯，尾鳍成交叉状；身躯底部至侧边的色 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from American Spanish, from Spanish atún 'tunny'
mid 16th cent.: via Spanish from Taino

entry.def: Tuna or tuna fish are large fish that live in warm seas and are caught for food.

means.word_mean: 1. tropical American flat-jointed prickly pear; Jamaica
2. important warm-water fatty fish of the genus Thunnus of the family Scombridae; usually served as steaks
3. any very large marine food and game fish of the genus Thunnus; related to mackerel; chiefly of warm waters
